title: Episode 1 - We can't change the past, not yet
itunes:title: Episode 1 - We can't change the past, not yet
description:
On August 1, 2001 21-year-old Ryan Dougherty appeared in a Florida courtroom to plead no contest to felony charges for a crime he committed as a teenager. No longer the person he was back then, Ryan was looking forward to the future with his pregnant girlfriend who was due to give birth to their son in days. After court, Ryan met with his probation officer and was shocked to learn he had 48 hours to comply with the terms or he’d be sent to prison for 15 years. Distraught, Ryan confided in his 29-year-old sister Lee Grace and 26-year-old-brother Dylan. As the hours ticked by, the trio felt the only way to save Ryan from prison was to run. 


Check us out online! www.instagram.com/KT_Studios  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
